blogPost.excerpt: Scanly aims to help small businesses fight the pandemic. Free, fast, simple and user-friendly digital menus with QR codes should make business safer and increase sales by 20-40%.
blogPost.body: Scanly aims to help small businesses fight the pandemic. Free, fast, simple and user-friendly digital menus with QR codes should make business safer and increase sales by 20-40%.
blogPost.title: Scanly - Free contactless digital menus management
blogPost.author: Marat Muslimov

localize.description: Scanly的目标是帮助小企业抗击这种流行病。免费、快速、简单、用户友好的二维码数字菜单应该会让企业变得更安全，并使销售额增加20%-40%。
localize.tagline: 免费非接触式数字菜单管理

localize.description: Scanly的目標是幫助小企業抗擊這種流行病。免費、快速、簡單、用戶友好的二維碼數字菜單應該會讓企業變得更安全，並使銷售額增加20%-40%。
localize.tagline: 免費非接觸式數字菜單管理

localize.description: 🔎采样器是一个免费的简单工具，可以从互联网上收集音频样本。
🔎採樣器是一個免費的簡單工具，可以從互聯網上收集音頻樣本。

next.excerpt: Jumpr is the world’s first AR jump rope! Simply place your iPhone upright on the floor, Jumpr uses AI-powered body tracking to detect your movement and give you a virtual jump rope on the screen to begin skipping away!
next.title: Jumpr - Virtual jump rope APP

localize.description: Jumpr是世界上第一根AR跳绳！只需将你的iPhone直立放在地板上，Jumpr使用人工智能驱动的身体跟踪来检测你的移动，并在屏幕上给你一个虚拟的跳绳，开始跳走！
Jumpr是世界上第一根AR跳繩！只需將你的iPhone直立放在地板上，Jumpr使用人工智能驅動的身體跟蹤來檢測你的移動，並在屏幕上給你一個虛擬的跳繩，開始跳走！
